summary: This document is an email exchange regarding scheduling a meeting between Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team. Amanda Kirby communicates with Lesley about setting up an appointment for Epstein to discuss his accounts upon his return to New York City.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as a member of the Deutsche Bank team who will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request to set up a meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual requesting a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team regarding his accounts.

persons.name: Lesley
persons.context: Lesley is involved in scheduling the meeting for Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein for a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team.
Paul is part of the Deutsche Bank team that will manage Epstein's accounts.
Harry informs Amanda about Epstein's request for a meeting.
Lesley and Amanda are working together to schedule the meeting for Epstein.

events.title: Meeting Scheduling
events.description: A meeting is being scheduled for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team upon his return to NYC.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.
The meeting is proposed for October 7th or 8th, 2013.
Harry informed Amanda about Epstein's request for the meeting.
Lesley is involved in the scheduling process for the meeting.
